I'm sure as long as my dues are paid up and I conduct myself in a professional way I could come back anytime I wanted to. Same as the Moose lodge. Every time I sit at the bar sooner or later some woman sits next to me and I end up saying something and she slaps me or gets her husband or boyfriend and I end up on the floor. content: I don't agree with Maher much but he does make me laugh every now and again. I make myself watch both sides to keep it balanced and if you have to watch the hard left radicals you might as well get a laugh at the same time. I have to say he has made fun of Obama too, not as much as Bush and the Reps of course but pretty much anything goes with him. His panel is always one sided and so I can't take it too seriously much like I can't take the View too seriously. I also throw in Fox, CNN, John Stewart and GMA so that about covers all sides, yes? Anyway, I don't like anyone who talks trash about my military and you better know I let people know it.

Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?
quote: Originally posted by Duster6: quote: Originally posted by sargeant_green: quote: Originally posted by Duster6: Maher is an entertainer just like Hanoi Jane is. If you want to destroy him just don't watch him. I don't. It he ever performs on stage near me I will gladly buy a ticket and throw a egg or tomato at him. My lawyer will take care of me if I have to go to court. Besides it would make good news print for me and I would be welcome back into the VFW. How did you get kicked out? I didn't really get kicked out. Once I get to having a few drinks I like to pick on Marines at the bar. It always ends up with them beating me up or me getting thrown out. I was told if I couldn't conduct myself in a gentlemen way that I was not welcomed back. So I haven't been back yet. I'm sure as long as my dues are paid up and I conduct myself in a professional way I could come back anytime I wanted to. Same as the Moose lodge. Every time I sit at the bar sooner or later some woman sits next to me and I end up saying something and she slaps me or gets her husband or boyfriend and I end up on the floor. Some people might say I have a drinking problem but sometimes I'm not even drinking and I get into these fights.
reply: You sound like one of my brothers. I'm the innocent guy who gets hit and doesn't even know why. I will stand and defend though, so if I ever end up in [insert your state here] I'll look you up and we can go harrass the regalurs. content: I don't agree with Maher much but he does make me laugh every now and again. I make myself watch both sides to keep it balanced and if you have to watch the hard left radicals you might as well get a laugh at the same time. I have to say he has made fun of Obama too, not as much as Bush and the Reps of course but pretty much anything goes with him. His panel is always one sided and so I can't take it too seriously much like I can't take the View too seriously. I also throw in Fox, CNN, John Stewart and GMA so that about covers all sides, yes? Anyway, I don't like anyone who talks trash about my military and you better know I let people know it.

content: First and foremost all these characters like Rush, O'Reilly, Maher, Coulter, Ingram are just that, characters they created up to stir up people. I doubt they believe in half the dribble they spill forth. It is about ratings and appealing to those extremists and people who believe everything they read and hear. They have to out do each other to grab the limelight. It amazes me that people watch these shows, and what is more amazing is when people say they hate this person and they heard him say this and that. If I don't like someone on TV, I just don't tune in to that person. You now have another character Beck LOL. They must all be reading from the same character scripts.
